pillars.label: Retention
pillars.summary: Reduce navigation friction so returning learners can reach fresh content faster.

communications.message: Report feed click-depth delta and qualitative blockers from support transcripts.
Highlight returning learner uplift driven by annex remediation.

nav-click-depth.valuationNotes: Each 0.1 reduction maps to a 0.6pt increase in weekly active ratio.

return-visit-rate.valuationNotes: Ties to cohort retention and upsell eligibility.

pillars.label: Activation
pillars.summary: Improve discovery metadata and filter adoption to shorten time-to-value for new learners.

communications.message: Share filter engagement trends and qualitative notes from learner interviews.

filter-engagement-rate.valuationNotes: Filter usage demonstrates meaningful catalog exploration.

pillars.label: Efficiency
pillars.summary: Reduce rework in instructor tooling by surfacing readiness gating and evidence capture inline.

communications.message: Publish readiness pass rates and backlog of evidence capture tasks.

upload-readiness-pass-rate.valuationNotes: Directly influences course launch velocity and instructor NPS.

evidence-capture-latency.valuationNotes: Audit compliance requirement before scaling annex rollouts.
